name: Force of Nature
tooltip:
Force of Nature

Cost: 2900
+350 Health
+60 Magic Resistance
+5% Move Speed

UNIQUE Passive - Absorb: Taking ability damage grants you 6 bonus movement speed and 4 bonus magic resistance for 5 seconds, stacking up to 5 times for a maximum of 30 bonus movement speed and 20 bonus magic resistance. Each unique ability gives 1 stack.
